data.text: Nhaw wo ho, nnebɔneyɛfo nti;
Wɔte sɛ sare, ɛrenkyɛ na ahyew,
Fa wo ho to Awurade so na yɛ papa.
Ma wʼani nnye wɔ Awurade mu
Fa wʼakwan hyɛ Awurade nsam;
ɔbɛma wo treneeyɛ ahyerɛn sɛ adekyee,
Yɛ komm wɔ Awurade anim na tɔ wo bo ase twɛn no,
Mma wo bo mmfuw na gyae abufuwhyew;
Wobetwa nnebɔneyɛfo agu,
Ɛrenkyɛ, nnebɔneyɛfo bɛyera.
Nanso ahobrɛasefo benya asase no adi so
Amumɔyɛfo bɔ pɔw bɔne tia atreneefo
nanso Awurade serew amumɔyɛfo,
Amumɔyɛfo twe afoa
Nanso wɔn afoa bɛwowɔ wɔn ankasa koma mu,
Kakra a atreneefo wɔ no som bo
efisɛ amumɔyɛfo ahoɔden bɛsa
Awurade nim wɔn a wɔn ho nni asɛm no nna,
Ahohiahia bere mu wɔremmrɛ.
Nanso amumɔyɛfo bɛyera.
Amumɔyɛfo pɛ bosea, na wontua,
Wɔn a Awurade ahyira wɔn no benya asase no adi so,
Sɛ Awurade ani sɔ onipa akwan a,
Sɛ ohintiw a ɔrenhwe ase,
Na meyɛ aberante, na mprempren mabɔ akwakoraa,
Bere biara ɔyɛ adɔe, na ɔde fɛm kwa;
Twe wo ho fi bɔne ho na yɛ papa
Efisɛ, Awurade pɛ nea ɛteɛ,
Atreneefo benya asase no adi so
Ɔtreneeni ano ka nyansasɛm,
Ne Nyankopɔn mmara wɔ ne koma mu;
Amumɔyɛfo tetɛw atreneefo
nanso Awurade nnyaa wɔn mma wɔn,
Montwɛn Awurade
Mahu omumɔyɛfo a ɔyɛ basabasa
nanso ankyɛ na nʼawiei bae a wonhu no bio;
Susuw nea ɔyɛ pɛ ho, na hwɛ nea ɔteɛ;
Nanso wɔbɛsɛe nnebɔneyɛfo nyinaa;
Atreneefo nkwagye fi Awurade
Awurade boa wɔn na ogye wɔn;
